author: cnbc.com
title: Airgain beats 4Q profit forecasts
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ Airgain Inc. (AIRG) on Thursday reported fourth-quarter earnings of $592,000.
On a per-share basis, the San Diego-based company said it had net income of 6 cents. Earnings, adjusted for stock option expense and non-recurring costs, came to 10   topped Wall   three   for earnings of 5 cents per share.
The antenna products developer posted revenue of $12.8 million in the period.
  profit of $1.1 million, or 11 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $49.5 million.
Airgain shares have risen 14   In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, shares hit $10.28, a decline of 34 percent in the last 12 months.
